description: Consume messages from Microsoft Azure Eventhub
name: Consume Eventhub messages

hub_connection_string.description: The connection string to connect the eventhub on Microsoft Azure eventHub

storage_connection_string.description: The connection string to connect the Microsoft Azure Storage blob

storage_container_name.description: The name of the container to use

hub_consumer_group.description: The consumer group to supplied to the hub

intake_key.description: Intake key to use when sending events

chunk_size.description: The max size of chunks for the batch processing
